accuracytest.cpp

This is an example of how to use the CStconfig class. The accuracy of coordinate transformation is verified and statistics is printed.

#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <time.h>
#include "../include/CStconfig.h"
#include <iomanip>
#include <iostream>

const double   pi = 3.14159265358979323846;
const double   twopi = 2*pi;
const double   degree = pi/180;

double epsA=1e-4;
double epsTrunc=1e-5;

void SeedRandom(int sw);// Set seed value for random number generator
double Random(void);    // Returns uniformly distributed random number between 0 and 1

//*********************************************************************
//
int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
  using namespace std;
  MConf::CStconfig mConf;
  clock_t tStart = clock();

  mConf.load ("w7x-sc1(reduced).bc");
//  mConf.load("X:/w7as/neocl/config/w7x-sc1.bc");        // for Windows
//  mConf.load("/afs/ipp/w7as/neocl/config/w7x-sc1.bc");  // for Linux

  if(!mConf.isOK()) {cout << "Loading error\n";return 1;}
  cout << "Loading time=" << double(clock() - tStart)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC <<"\n";

  mConf.truncate(epsTrunc);           // truncate spectrum
//  mConf.write("w7x-sc1_1e-5.bin8"); // save truncated file
//  mConf.write("w7x-sc1_1e-5.bin4");

  mConf.setAccuracy(epsA);       // set accuracy of coordinate transformation
  mConf.setB0(2.5);                   // set minimal value of B on magn. axis

// create random points in boozer and cyl. coordinates
  int maxVectors = 10000;
  MConf::Vector3d *cyl = new MConf::Vector3d[maxVectors];
  MConf::Vector3d *booz = new MConf::Vector3d[maxVectors];
  SeedRandom(0);
  int i;
  for(i=0; i<maxVectors; i++) {
    booz[i] = MConf::Vector3d(Random(),Random()*2*pi,Random()*2*pi/mConf.nPeriods());//random vector
    cyl[i] = mConf.mag2cyl(booz[i]);      // calculate cyl. coordinales
  }

// do coordinate transformation
  cout <<"***residual error of  back and forth transformation in Boozer space*****\n";
  cout <<"   i        s         theta       phi         err(s)    err(theta)   err(phi)\n";
  cout.precision(2);
  cout.setf(ios::scientific|ios::showpos);
  mConf.zeroStatistics();
  tStart = clock();
  for(i=0; i<maxVectors; i++)   {
    MConf::Vector3d booz1 = mConf.cyl2mag(cyl[i]);  // transform to Boozer coord.
    MConf::Vector3d err  = booz[i]-booz1;
    err[1]=mConf.mod2pi(err[1]);   // remove twopi
    if(err[1]>1) err[1]-=twopi;    // remove twopi
    err[2]=mConf.mod2pi(err[2]);
    if(err[2]>pi) err[2]-=twopi;   // remove twopi
    if(err.abs()>10*epsA)
        cout<<setw(6)<<i<<" "<< booz[i]<<" | "<<err <<endl;
  }
  cout.setf(ios::fixed,ios::showpos|ios::scientific);
  cout << "\nTrans time=" << double(clock() - tStart)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC <<"\n";
  cout << "processed nodes "<<maxVectors<<"\n";
  cout << "# of coord. transfomation "<<mConf.n2mag()<<"\n\n";
  cout << "Average CPU time per node=" << double(clock() - tStart)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC/maxVectors<<"\n";
  cout << "Average number of Newton iteration per node="<<mConf.NNjacCalls()/maxVectors<<"\n";
  cout << "Average number of poloidal harmonic used in summation <M>="<<mConf.MAverage()<<"\n";
  cout << "Average number of toroidal harmonic used in summation <N>="<<mConf.NAverage()<<"\n";

  delete[] booz;
  delete[] cyl;
  return 0;
}

//******************************************************************
// Set random starting point.
//  srand()  from <stdlib.h>
// if sw==0  then random seed value
void SeedRandom(int sw=0)
{
  if(sw)  srand(sw);
  else    srand((unsigned)time(NULL));
}
//******************************************************************
// Returns uniformly distributed random number between 0 and 1
//  rand() from <stdlib.h>
double Random(void)
{
  static double norm = 1./(double)RAND_MAX;
  return (rand()*norm);
}
